createNewPresentation: It looks like the presentation you are looking for is not found. Let's create a brand new presentation!
selectTheModelToBeUsed: Select the Model to be used
failedToConnectToServer: Failed to connect to the server. Please try again.
waitForOutlinesToLoadBeforeGeneratingPre: Please wait for outlines to load before generating presentation
selectLayoutGroupBeforeGeneratingPresent: Please select a layout group before generating presentation
selectGroupBeforeGeneratingPresentation: Please select a Group before generating presentation
selectAIModelBeforeGeneratingPresentatio: Please select a presentation generation model before generating presentation
selectImageModelBeforeGeneratingPresenta: Please select an image generation model before generating presentation
noTemplatesAvailableDescription: No presentation templates could be loaded. Please try refreshing the page.
selectModelWillBeUsedToGeneratePresentat: Select an AI Model Will Be Used To Generate Presentation
selectModelWillBeUsedToGenerateImage: Select an AI Model Will Be Used To Generate Image
selectModelNote: Select different models will cause different results in terms of quality, style and processing time. GPT-5 model will take longer time to generate presentation and consume more credits. If you don't have special requirements, it is not recommended to select GPT-5 model.
selectModelNoteForImage: And current version only support Gemini-2.5-flash(Nano-banana) model to generate images. It will cost 6 credits to generate one image. We will support other image generation models soon. Please stay tuned.
